RelatedSentence: Placing the Saudi growth story in the context of GCC growth , Mahendran said there were several reasons to remain invested in GCC equities .
He added that the improving volumes , liquidity and foreign ownership limits , were expected to generate a spate of IPOs to provide greater depth and breadth to the GCC markets .
